item.title: About Me and this Site
item.description: My name is Michael Todd Lewis, though my friends call me Bigtime, or more often Biggie or just Big. My pronouns are whatever you feel like, but most people use he/him with me. This website serves as a new blog for me, just somewhere to capture some thoughts and share things I find interesting. About me: I am a software development team leader by trade. I believe very deeply in the principles of servant leadership and find great joy in helping others be successful.

item.title: First Post
item.description: This is my first post on my new site. It will get deleted when I am finished setting stuff up.
